server

Class WaitListSingelton

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.WaitListSingelton

  • public class WaitListSingelton
extends java.lang.Object
    The WaitListSingelton program serves the WaitList program
    Author:
    Roi Amar

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static boolean CancelWaitlist(Order recived)
      true if found the order on the wait list and removed it, false if not. // DB: delete the wait list entry of that order if found
      static void CheckTheWaitList()
      DB: delete (if found) expired orders listed in pending (more than 1 hour) delete (if found) expired orders listed in waitlist (more than 24 hours) NOTE: the timeLastChecked mechanizem make sure that this function run not more than once per minute (to not overload the server and DB each time) the LastDailyCheck mechanizem make sure that the function of deleting from the waitlist will not run more than once per day the LastNightCheck mechanizem make sure that the function of sending tomorrow notifications will not run more than once per day
      static WaitListSingelton getWaitlist()
      Singleton, create one instance only
      static boolean orderConfirm(Order order)
      true if time replayed has not reached the limit false if limit has reached
      static boolean removePending(Order order)
      true if found the order on the wait list and removed it, false if not. // send to DB: order to remove from pending
      static void send24HoursNotification(Order order)
      send to client: SMS and Mail notification
      static void sendWaitlistNotification(Order order)
      function that sends notifications to the client (SMS and Mail notification)

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getWaitlist

        public static WaitListSingelton getWaitlist()
        Singleton, create one instance only
        Returns:
        WaitListSingelton. if not existing. creating new one and sending it

      • sendWaitlistNotification

        public static void sendWaitlistNotification(Order order)
        function that sends notifications to the client (SMS and Mail notification)
        Parameters:
        order - Order object that is pulled from the wait list

      • send24HoursNotification

        public static void send24HoursNotification(Order order)
        send to client: SMS and Mail notification
        Parameters:
        order - object (that is pulled from the wait list)

      • CheckTheWaitList

        public static void CheckTheWaitList()
        DB: delete (if found) expired orders listed in pending (more than 1 hour) delete (if found) expired orders listed in waitlist (more than 24 hours) NOTE: the timeLastChecked mechanizem make sure that this function run not more than once per minute (to not overload the server and DB each time) the LastDailyCheck mechanizem make sure that the function of deleting from the waitlist will not run more than once per day the LastNightCheck mechanizem make sure that the function of sending tomorrow notifications will not run more than once per day

      • orderConfirm

        public static boolean orderConfirm(Order order)
        true if time replayed has not reached the limit false if limit has reached
        Parameters:
        order - Order object
        Returns:
        T/F

      • CancelWaitlist

        public static boolean CancelWaitlist(Order recived)
        true if found the order on the wait list and removed it, false if not. // DB: delete the wait list entry of that order if found
        Parameters:
        recived - Order Object
        Returns:
        T/F

      • removePending

        public static boolean removePending(Order order)
        true if found the order on the wait list and removed it, false if not. // send to DB: order to remove from pending
        Parameters:
        order - Order object
        Returns:
        T/F
